335 Fenimore: Luxurious Living Near Prospect Park Stunning 2-Bedroom Apartment!
Apartment Features: Air Conditioning Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Appliances Dishwasher Spacious Common Area Pet-Friendly Abundant Natural Light Track Lighting
Building Amenities: Gym Parking Laundry Room Roof Deck Media Room Bike Room

Enjoy a perfect blend of luxury and convenience in this beautiful unit!

Beautiful 2-Bedroom, 1-Bath Apartment!
Apartment Features:
Air Conditioning for Year-Round Comfort Sleek Hardwood Flooring Throughout Modern Stainless Steel Appliances Convenient Dishwasher Expansive Living and Dining Area Recently Renovated Bathrooms with Elegant Finishes Abundant Natural Light in Every Room Stylish Track Lighting
Pet-Friendly ? Furry Companions Welcome! Available now No broker fee

Luxury Living in Ditmas Park ? No Broker Fee (Photos are of a similar unit with same finishes)
This beautiful elevator building is nestled on a picturesque, tree-lined street and ready for an August 1st move-in!
Apartment Features: Spacious bedrooms with ample closet space
- Generously sized living area - Abundant natural light throughout - Gleaming hardwood floors - Individual split units in each room for personalized climate control
Building Amenities: Resident lounge Fully furnished rooftop and outdoor spaces Bike storage On-site laundry room Co-working space with computer stations and complimentary Wi-Fi State-of-the-art fitness center
Prime Location: Just steps from the B/Q and 2/5 subway lines ? convenient access to everything Brooklyn and beyond has to offer!
No broker fee 8/1 move in Pets welcome

Luxury Living at The Dean Discover a condo-style residence in Crown Heights featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, hardwood floors, premium appliances, a large balcony, and stunning city views.
Exceptional Amenities Enjoy a stylish lobby, multiple lounges, a landscaped courtyard with greenhouse, gym, yoga studio, rooftop deck ( coming soon), business lounge, doorman, and laundry on every floor.
Prime Location Just steps from the A/C/S trains and minutes to Manhattan, surrounded by top Brooklyn dining, bars, and cafes. Can reach out if needed a sooner move as well

Beautiful pre-war 2 bedroom in Prime Williamsburg
Located at Roebling and South 3rd --- 4 minutes to the Marcy JMZ
2 big sunny bedrooms real living room with great layout -- fits a sofa, coffee table and TV separate kitchen tons of natural light in all rooms inc heat and hot water
September 1st move in Small pets OK

Beautifully NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bed in Williamsburg
Located at Rodney and South 4th 3 minutes door to platform ? Marcy JMZ
Brand new renovation with TONS of natural light New kitchen / bath Stainless steel appliances
Located directly at the entrance to the Williamsburg Bridge, this apartment perfect for any commute into the city. 3 blocks from the Marcy JMZ. 10 minute commute into the city. Around the corner from Broadway, which has everything you need.
Heat and Hot water are included This apartment is an amazing deal in this location, do not miss out!
Available 10/1 Small pets welcome

Gorgeous 2BR in the heart of Williamsburg, close to the L,G and JMZ train lines. This lovely apartment features a queen size bedroom drenched in sunlight with large closet, separate kitchen with lots of cabinet and counter space, stainless steel appliances, large updated bathroom with deep soaking bathtub, and spacious separate living room with TONS of light throughout.
Pets allowed, live-in super, only first & security. Plus, heat and hot water are included!
Small pets OK Available 10/1

Super sized 1 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
Big bedroom Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available Oct 1st Small pets accepted

Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom + Home office available with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
- Queen sized bedroom - Full sized bedroom - MASSIVE living room space - Tons of light, exposed brick, updated modern bathroom, kingsize bedrooms & plenty of space for entertaining.
Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants & shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
Available now No broker fee Heat & hot water included Small pets welcome

Super sized 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available 9/1 Small pets accepted

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and heat and hot water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Montrose L train.
Available now Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK 10/1 move in

Jr 3br with private balcony! Can be used as a 3br with small common space or a 2br plus office / extra common space. When used as a 3br , one bedroom does not have windows . Just a cutout bringing light in from other room. See video.
Located near Morgan L and Flushing JM, near Maria Hernandez Park and steps from great bars, restaurants and shopping
Features: - Elevator - Individual HVAC (Heating and AC) units in each room - Laundry Room - Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan - Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances - Hardwood floors - Garage with Zip Cars
?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!

Massive 2 bedroom Duplex with basement level and 1000sq PRIVATE yard!
This is a gem. If you need space and you want a massive private year this could be the one!
Call or text to set up immediate viewing.

2 Bed CORNER UNIT Penthouse with amazing views ready for immediate move in!
Please see video on StreetEasy ad or send message and I?ll send to you!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Vaulted ceiling Gas fireplace Top floor of elevator building. 2 elevator bays make sure you never have to wait! Corner apartment with TONs of natural light Kitchen island perfect for setting up stools for dining Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Efficient PTAC heat and cooling unit for all rooms Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck with spectacular skyline views Zipcars available Bike storage Go lockers for secure package delivery State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok NO FEE! Just 1st and security to move in! Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee per person
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Beautiful 2.5BR/1.5bath duplex with private yard!!
Looking for tons of space? This could be a 3br or a huge 2br plus basement level. The yard is private to this apartment Spiral staircase going downstairs. Additional set of stairs to the basement level with a door to basement level for easier moving of large items. Hardwood floors Laundry in the building Next to both L and M trains Video and pics of actual unit. If you can?t see the video let me know and I?ll sent it to you. Currently tenant occupied until end of the month.
Pets ok No fee Only First & Security to move in
Contact to schedule your appointment today!

Large 2BR with queen size rooms, large balcony and huge PRIVATE roof deck and private balcony. Common area big enough for a couch, tv and dining table. The unit features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floor, white tile kitchen backsplash and bathroom, individual a/c units in each room. Spiral staircase to a small room which opens to your own private roof deck. The building features an elevator, laundry room, roof deck, zip car, security system, and is located in the center of Bushwick!
Building also features 2 large shared roof decks and a laundry room. Parking and zip car services available. Elevator
1/2 a block from the Dekalb L and 5min walk to the M train. NO fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

2 Bed / 1bath with private balcony, in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Private balcony Bedrooms on opposite sides of the large living room Faces the back of the building away from any street noise Sunny 4th floor apartment Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok No fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to view the right away!

Huge luxury 2br with private balcony!!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Private balcony is 6ft x 10ft Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Elevator Laundy Huge Roof deck ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Parking lot (extra per month and depends on availability) Zipcars available Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets no fee Call or message to view right away

Can be used as a 2br with small common space in the middle or a large 1br. Private outdoor space. Heat and hot water included! Both room are very large. Back room has access to private outdoor space. Custom kitchen with granite countertops, microwave and stainless steel appliances. Large enough for kitchen table and chairs. Large renovated bathroom. Located at Harman right off Knickerbocker Ave. Close to the Knickerbocker M Train or the Dekalb L Train.
Located in the back building away from any street noise. Has a small private outdoor space as well as a very large shared courtyard for the building. See video on streeteasy or message me and I'll send to you.
Pets ok! $20 application fee Heat and hot water included Sorry, no laundry in the building.
Call or text to set up a viewing right away!

PRIVATE BACKYARD Amazing boxed 2 bedroom PERFECT location Tons of light
Message to view ASAP!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Available 10/1!
2 BEDROOM 2 FULL PRIVATE BATH
-Open concept living room and modern kitchen -Stainless steel appliances -Hardwood floors -High ceilings -Sunny windows in every room! Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle ? Willoughby Ave(G), Myrtle Av (J, M).

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short distance to the J, M trains.

The Baltic Canal ? Modern Living in Boerum Hill
Studios, 1- & 2-BR homes with oversized windows, white oak floors, custom kitchens, spa-style baths, and in-unit or on-site laundry. Select residences offer private balconies or terraces.
Amenities: Bike room, elevator, package room, gym, media room, and multiple outdoor spaces ? deck, garden, patio & panoramic roof deck.
Unbeatable location at the crossroads of Boerum Hill, Gowanus & Park Slope, near Whole Foods, top restaurants, boutique shops & F/G/R trains.
📅 Schedule your tour today and make The Baltic Canal your next home.
